articles.title: 'Don't know of a more skillful in the world bowler than Bhuvneshwar Kumar': Michael Vaughan - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Former England captain Michael Vaughan went on to call India's Bhuvneshwar 'the most skillful white-ball bowler in the world' currently, who possesses great variety. He also heaped praise on his fantastic comeback.
articles.content: Former England skipper Michael Vaughan was all praise for Indian pacer Bhuvneshwar Kumar. Coming back to the squad on the back of a long injury layoff--which lasted over 15 months--the Uttar Pradesh … [+2918 chars]
